name: Death Barque
description: A massive and terrifying undead entity resembling a skeletal ship, the Death Barque is a harbinger of death in aquatic environments, marked by its dark, bone-like structure.
memorable: Its ability to unleash a devastating Necrotic Breath attack and high resistance to magical effects make it a fearsome adversary.
goals: To instill fear and destruction in watery domains, serving as a powerful adversary for adventurers.
relations: Associated with other undead creatures or marine monsters, often encountered in haunted waters.
environment: Primarily found in underwater or aquatic locales.
strengths: Immunities to necrotic and poison damage, and advantages on saving throws against turning effects.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma limit its effectiveness in social or intellectual encounters.
attacks: Multiattack consisting of a bite and two tail smashes, both capable of causing significant damage and battlefield control.
most_powerful_ability: Necrotic Breath attack, dealing substantial necrotic damage in a wide cone.
senses: Possesses a high passive perception of 16, indicating keen awareness in combat.
skills: Skilled in stealth and perception, enhancing its ability to ambush unsuspecting targets.
additional_information: Can deal double damage to objects and structures due to Siege Monster ability.
Has Magic Resistance, gaining advantage on saving throws against spells.
Immutable Form ability prevents alteration of its form by spells or effects.
Shrapnel Burst attack inflicts piercing damage and can blind opponents.
Turn Resistance makes it resilient against attempts to turn undead.
